Sentencas: Lanthanum strontium cobalt oxide (LSCO) has been employed as cathode and intercollector materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Characterization of the microstructure and electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 coating

Sentencas: In the present study, the La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 layer was deposited by atmospheric plasma spray (APS).
Titulo: Characterization of the microstructure and electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 coating

Sentencas: The effect of heat treatment on microstructure and electrical conductivity of the LSCO deposits was examined.
Titulo: Characterization of the microstructure and electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 coating

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the deposits along the lamellar direction was measured by a four-probe de approach.
Titulo: Characterization of the microstructure and electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 coating

Sentencas: The microstructure of the deposit was characterized by scanning electron microscopy and X-ray diffraction analysis.
Titulo: Characterization of the microstructure and electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 coating

Sentencas: The results showed that the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed LSCO coating was lower than that of sintered bulk material with the same composition.
Titulo: Characterization of the microstructure and electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 coating

Sentencas: The minor metastable phase in the as-sprayed coating reduced the electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Characterization of the microstructure and electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 coating

Sentencas: The annealing treatment at 1000 degrees C led to the elimination of the metastable phase and improved the electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Characterization of the microstructure and electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 coating

Sentencas: The lamellar structure features with the limited interface bonding limits the electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Characterization of the microstructure and electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 coating
